sense.name: Murder, especially a socially prominent person.
sense.commentary: NOTE: Object assassinated is CONCRETE, usually a human being.
sense.examples: Anwar Sadat was assassinated because people did not like his peace politics with Israel. That said, I think the dog should be assassinated. No damage but it appears that the dog is trying to assassinate my computer!

sense.name: Destroy or damage seriously, as of someone's reputation.
sense.examples: He assassinated his enemy's character. Don't assassinate my reputation with your blind accusations!
